snippet: Rielle Hunter, John Edwards’s former mistress, is publishing a memoir. Jennifer Canzoneri, marketing manager at BenBella Books, said “What Really Happened” is scheduled to be released on June 26.
abstract: Rielle Hunter, former mistress of John Edwards, is publishing a memoir entitled What Really Happened.
lead_paragraph: Rielle Hunter, John Edwards’s former mistress, is publishing a memoir. Jennifer Canzoneri, marketing manager at BenBella Books, said “What Really Happened” is scheduled to be released on June 26.

headline.main: North Carolina: Edwards’s Mistress to Release Memoir
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Edwards’s Mistress To Release Memoir
